name: Quiz Carnage
description:
Choose your themes or let the game decide for you.
Play with friends, in teams or try to beat the AI quizmaster!

There are 3 stages per round:

The attack


If you’re playing in teams mode, co-ordinate with your teammates to distribute penalty cards to opponent teams (if you don’t co-ordinate, nothing happens).
But watch out for your energy levels: each penalty given will cost you and some strategizing may be necessary as you go along.

Answer and strike back


Each player answers each question individually, and will have to deal with the opponent’s penalty choice! Bonus cards may help save the day by undoing the effects of the penalty or providing extra energy or score boosts.

Results


Who scored best? Who gained/lost the most?
Knowledge isn’t enough to win the game: get ready for surprises!




There are two game modes:

  • Open play: you play with connected players.
  • Private play: you play with friends.

And if you're alone, challenge our bots! They will be waiting for you in the waiting room.


Malus cards

When in team mode, coordination and cooperation will be your strengths: your team should act as one, all players must agree on the same malus card for each opponent team.

Energy levels

Did you really think that malus cards came without a price? Each malus card costs you energy. Each time you use a malus card, your energy level will go down, and the worse the penalty, the higher the cost. You'll have to put in place some strategies concerning energy usage... so, to malus or not to malus, that's the question!

Bonus cards

In each round, you can counter-attack with bonus cards.
There are three types of bonus cards:
  • Shields: these cancel out malus effects, allowing you to answer more easily.
  • Energy: these will either increase your energy level or decrease your opponents’ levels.
  • Points: these will add points to your final score or remove points from your opponents’ scores.

Gifts

Depending on how you played, you may be given gifts. How and what? Play Quiz Carnage to find out!
